original_text: Do not agree with those people who want to make you obey the Jewish rules. They say that you must let someone circumcise you. They want other people to think that they are important. They do not want to receive any trouble from others. They are afraid to teach that Christ's death on the cross is enough to save us.
korean_text: 무릇 육체의 모양을 내려 하는 자들이 억지로 너희에게 할례를 받게 함은 그들이 그리스도의 십자가로 말미암아 박해를 면하려 함뿐이라

sentences.original_text: Do not agree with those people
who want to make you obey the Jewish rules
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 유대 규칙을 따르게 하려는 사람들

sentences.original_text: They say that you must let someone circumcise you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신이 할례를 받아야 한다고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: They want other people to think that they are important
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들이 그들을 중요하게 생각하기를 원합니다

sentences.original_text: They do not want to receive any trouble from others
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 다른 사람들에게서 어떤 어려움도 받고 싶어하지 않습니다

sentences.original_text: that Christ's death on the cross is enough to save us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도의 십자가 죽음이 우리를 구하기에 충분하다는 것을
